name: Eggplant Bellpepper Pesto
description: This Eggplant Bellpepper Pesto recipe is perfect for those looking for a delightful, health-conscious meal. With its low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar elements, it suits a variety of dietary needs. Embrace a healthier eating style with this delicious combination of eggplant, bell pepper, and rich pesto.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 200°C (392°F) and prepare a baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the eggplant and red bell pepper, then cut the eggplant into cubes and the bell pepper into strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and finely chop the red onion and garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Place the eggplant, bell pepper, red onion, and garlic on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil (not listed in ingredients, please adjust) and toss to coat evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until they are nicely caramelized and tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the vegetables from the oven and let them cool slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the roasted vegetables with 2 tablespoons of pesto. Mix well until all the vegetables are evenly coated with the pesto.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Eggplant Bellpepper Pesto warm or at room temperature. Enjoy your healthy and flavorful dish!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
